titles.title: To amend the Job Training Partnership Act to provide counseling and guidance relating to postsecondary education options for dislocated workers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education and Training.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 3/17/1994--Introduced. Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to provide that specified funds for employment and training assistance for dislocated workers shall be used to provide counseling and guidance relating to postsecondary education options for eligible dislocated workers, including information on public and private programs of student financial assistance.
